entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
